name: stochseq
tagline: Statistical Inference for Nanopore Sequencing with a Biased Random Walk Model
body:
This repository includes files and scripts used in the following paper:

_K. Emmett, J. Rosenstein, J.W. van de Meent, K. Shepard, and C. Wiggins. Stochastic Inference For Nanopore Sequencings with a Biased Random Walk Model. Biophysical Journal. 2015._

At present, the model is implemented in matlab. To run:
* ``stochseq_build(seqlength, bias, err, nreads)`` : builds synthetic data
* ``stochseq_infer(model)`` : performs inference on model object

Functions:
* ``gen_dna(L)`` : generates a random dna sequence where each base is 
            represented by an integer between 1 and 4
* ``gen_read(dna, bias, err)`` : generates a random walk along 'dna'

Parameters:
* ``seqlength`` : sequence length
* ``bias`` : forward bias
* ``err`` : per base call error rate
* ``nreads`` : number of reads
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
